executable.title: MultiImageRegistration
executable.description: This programs implemented non-rigid groupwise registration by using B-Spline Defomation model.
executable.contributor: This tool was developed by Yongqiang Zhao.

parameters.label: Input
parameters.description: Parameters for specifying the input files name and parameters file for groupwise registratioin.

string.name: inputFilesName
string.label: Input files Name
string.description: The name of file that lists all the image files'name for groupwise registration.

string.name: parametersFileName
string.label: Name of parameters file
string.description: The name of file that lists all the parameters for groupwise registration.
